mapper.select: select sku.id, sku.sku_code, sku.sku_name, sku.product_id, sku.thumb_img, sku.sale_price, sku.market_price, sku.cost_price, sku.sku_spec, sku.weight, sku.volume, sku.status, sku.create_time, sku.update_time, sku.del_flag, ss.sale_num from product_sku sku left join product p on sku.product_id = p.id and p.audit_status = 0 and p.status = 0 and p.del_flag = '0' left join sku_stock ss on sku.id = ss.sku_id and ss.del_flag = '0' where sku.del_flag = 0 order by ss.sale_num desc limit 0,20
